response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I understand its worth to you might be around $1,500,000. Considering this, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $1,250,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a premium discount. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to discussing how we can collaborate on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 1250000}
